title: Installing fonts on a fileserver
content:
Apparently, there's not a limit to the number of fonts you can install on Windows (any version post-98).   
Two links for you: [1](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526120427/http:/graphicssoft.about.com/library/weekly/aa072099.htm) / [2](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526120427/http:/www.styopkin.com/articles/fonts_limit.html).
author: Eduardo Omine
